attributes.action: to scrap the conbined science G.C.S.E and bring back the old C.S.E
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to scrap the conbined science G.C.S.E and take the sepratly. also to bring back the old C.S.E. and to make the exam harder as they were over 30 years ago making it harder to get A's ans A*'s and higher the pass rate to grade C and to scrap course work becuase too much cheating is going on
